name: KnoFolio
tag_list: art, design, college, aicad, art--design, college-recruiting, admissions, portfolio, education, online-courses, critique, lead-generation, art-school, art-college
overview:
KnoFolio is an art & design portfolio-building platform that offers online courses, critique, and connection to the top art colleges.

Description: KnoFolio empowers aspiring artists to create a digital portfolio and share it with prestigious art & design colleges across the United States. KnoFolio offers portfolio development courses, constructive critique, and connection to the top art colleges in North America.

Rationale: There are no meaningful online art college preparatory platforms despite a stated need from admission counselors and students. There are many websites that help students fulfill admissions criteria for traditional colleges and universities. The platforms usually take the form of ACT/SAT E-learning. The ACT/SAT is the key differentiator in a student’s application for traditional colleges and universities, whereas the portfolio is the key differentiator in a student’s application for an art college.

KnoFolio will fill the demand for online portfolio development. It will be in a digital environment to free the student from the constraints of time and space. Students will have the ability to create a portfolio that meets the standards of art colleges without being hindered by economic or geographic constraints.

Components: KnoFolio is broken into 4 components. These components reflect the essentials of a pre-college art program, and will provide the criteria to develop a meaningful body of work.

•Portfolio Users will have the ability to upload their work, categorize it, and get it in front of The KnoFolio Community.

•Critique The KnoFolio Community will provide meaningful critique on submitted work.

•Development Courses Users will be offered many portfolio development courses that will help students create meaningful work that reflects what art colleges desire.

•Art College Match Users will be able to browse accredited art & design colleges to find the best match for their artistic pursuits.
